aboutUsContent: We are a company established in 2019 in San Jacinto, California. The commitment behind Beauty by Rous is to help clients feel more self-confident by making different aesthetic treatments available to everyone. At Beauty by Rous we care about each of our clients, that is why we accompany our clients during their transformation and improvement process. We are committed to bringing the best treatments, so we are in constant training and improvement.
misionContent: Our mission is to help our clients to rediscover their true beauty at affordable prices.
visionContent: We are a company that seeks to improve the quality of life of our clients by helping to improve their image.
servicesDescription: We offer different aesthetic services ranging from eyelash extensions to body treatments.
servicePestaniasDesc: Lash extensions ( classic, hybrid and volume techniques), Lash Lift, Brow Lamination and henna.
serviceFacialDesc: In areas like abdomen, back, legs and arms. Butt lift. Facial with radiofrequency.
serviceMakeUpDesc: We offer makeup services for any occasion, Social, Soft Glam, Quinceañeras, Weddings, Prom, etc.
coursesMakeUpDesc: We have private classes or in a group for the Body Contouring.
galleryDesc: Enjoy our work, we are at your service.
